name: Glider
description: Aerial transportation made by Mechanist, inspired from Air nomad gliders.

name: Hot Air Balloon
description: Air balloon created by Mechanist, originally developed for the Fire Nation

name: Rock Gloves
description: Favored weapons of Ba Sing Se's secret police force, known as the Dai Li.

name: Slinky Tank
description: Stone vehicles provided both transportation and protection during the invasion of the Fire Nation.

name: Blue Fire
description: Bend completely blue flames, which are hotter than the orange flames.

name: Combustionbending
description: Ignite objects with their mind instead of traditional firebending methods.

name: Lightningbending
description: Manipulate lightning by separating the yin and yang energies.

name: Ice Claws
description: Drawing water around the fingers and freezing it.

name: Ice Prison
description: This technique covers an opponent in a prison made of ice.

name: Ozai Lightning
description: Blue lightning of Lord Fire Ozai at Final battle.
